Name: Boston Tea Party
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca-Cola or Pepsi)
Instructions: SHAKE first ten ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with cola and serve with straws.
Review: Just about every spirit from the speedrail plus a splash of orange, lime and coke.
History: Named after the revolt by early US settlers against the imposition of tax by the British Crown, which became the War of Independence.
Nutrition: One serving of Boston Tea Party contains 290 calories
